question:
Which among the following benefits are provided under the IT SEZ scheme?
1) 100% income tax exemption on export income
2) Duty-free import
3) Accelerated depreciation
Choose the correct option from the choices given below:
explanation:
The benefits are provided under the IT SEZ scheme are:
1) 100% income tax exemption on export income
2) Duty-free import
These are to promote exports of the IT industry.
